product_name: REI Arctic Pod Sleeping Bag - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: A great choice for 3-season backpacking and camping, this roomy sleeping bag is cut with extra room for comfort and is insulated with quality synthetic fill to keep you warm even in damp climates.
short_description: A great choice for 3-season backpacking and camping, this roomy sleeping bag is cut with extra room for comfort and is insulated with quality synthetic fill to keep you warm even in damp climates.
